definition: values that resolve to the Boolean false

name: Array.sort()
notes: the comparison function should return a number such that a negative value indicates that a should come before b, a positive value indicates that a should come after b, and zero or NaN indicates that a and b are considered equal.

definition: the raw HTML markup inside an element
notes: innerHTML does not ignore styling or return only visible text

definition: holds the user's value entered or selected in a form field
notes: specifically for form elements like <input>, <select>, and <textarea>

list.interpretation: null character (U+0000 <control-0000> ) (only if the next character is not a decimal digit; else it is an octal escape sequence)
character represented by the hexadecimal byte FF

name: npm
definition: the standard package manager for Node.js
description: npm installs, updates and manages downloads of dependencies of your project
